I2A3Se0G75U.title: Be Sincere Only for Allah - Nouman Ali Khan - A Deeper Look Series -Surah Abasa
I2A3Se0G75U.description:
The first ayat of this surah show how Allah measures a person's worth. To Allah a blind man whose heart is filled with taqwa is worth more than an arrogant elite. These ayat also offer a timeless lesson on how to treat people with special needs.

📚 Start your Qur'an journey at https://signup.bayyinahtv.com/DeeperLook!

m5ZREEq6XtQ.title: Allah’s Armies (The Horse. The Wind. The Angels) | Surah Al-Mursalat | Nouman Ali Khan
m5ZREEq6XtQ.description:
Watch the full reflection now of Surah Al-Mursalat on Bayyinah TV: https://byna.tv/106.

In this snippet of a Deeper Look of Surah Al-Mursalat, Ustadh Nouman Ali Khan unpacks the layered imagery described in the opening of the surah. What begins with a reference to winds quickly expands into a powerful scene of divine control, through winds, angels and even horses. Drawing on the Arab’s deep connection with horses, Ustadh brings the verses to life by showing how Allah uses familiar symbols to awaken deeper truths.

This isn’t just a description of nature, it’s a warning. Winds, which we often take for granted, are shown as instruments of divine judgment and mercy. The episode also explores the idea of spiritual obedience and the unseen deployment of Allah’s armies.

From battlefield logistics to shifting winds, the Quran calls humanity to recognize their dependence and their delusion when they think they are in control.
------------------------------

📚 Start your Quran journey at https://www.bayyinahtv.com
🎁 Sponsor a soul who seeks the Quran with a Bayyinah TV membership at https://bayyinah.com/gift

PHb--8mSMXw.title: Are You Willing to Truly Sacrifice for Allah? | Lecture by Dr. Omar Suleiman
PHb--8mSMXw.description:
In this powerful reflection, Dr. Omar Suleiman shares a moving conversation with a man who was wrongfully imprisoned as part of the Holy Land Foundation Five—men known for their humanitarian work for Palestinian children. Despite enduring extreme hardship, including solitary confinement, this brother's deep faith and commitment never wavered.

Explore how to stay true to our values, find purpose through our struggles, and stay spiritually grounded no matter the circumstances.

00:00 A Reunion After Two Decades
00:31 The Holy Land Foundation Five
01:34 Life in Prison and Unbroken Spirits
03:39 The Power of Faith and Resilience
05:55 True Freedom and Captivity
08:54 Consistency in Worship
12:06 Falling in Love with Sacrifice
33:02 The Story of Mahmoud Abdul-Rauf
39:47 A Young Woman's Courageous Stand

#omarsuleiman #allah #islam #palestine
